SEARCH
Package org.cyclops.integratedterminals.api.terminalstorage.crafting

Interface ITerminalCraftingPlanFlat<I>

Type Parameters:
I - The type of identifier.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TerminalCraftingPlanFlatStatic
public interface ITerminalCraftingPlanFlat<I>
A job for crafting a given instance. This is a flattened representation of ITerminalCraftingPlan. It is possible that a job requires no actual crafting, but can be fetched from storage completely.

    • getId

      I getId()
      Returns:
      The unique id of this plan.

    • getEntries

      long getTickDuration()
      Returns:
      The tick duration for this job. -1 indicates no duration.

      Returns:
      The channel id, or -1 for non-applicable.
